channel.title: My router. and Connection with Codefasga.com
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a current question about www.no-ip.com.
whats the problem?
The problem is i signed up for no-ip.com and i get my server running then post is on codefasga.com. After 4 hours or so i shut it down and when i got to start it back up the next day it's all started but! heres the thing- my server is running and people can get on it but on codefasga.com it says it's offline and I"m like wdf? lol
does this have anything to do with my router.? Because someone said it does i went to look for my router in my computer but ( nothing found )-also could someone tell me where is located.?
Please dont flame/hate on this thread I"m very new.
